scripts.build:css: npm run build:fontawesome && npm run build:sass && npm run build:postcss
scripts.build:js: babel js/*.js js/activity/feed.js --out-dir theme/static/js && concat js/activity/*.min.js theme/static/js/feed.js -o theme/static/js/activity.js && rm theme/static/js/feed.js
scripts.minify: npm run minify:activity && npm run minify:theme && npm run minify:faq && npm run minify:modal
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run minify
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run serve" "npm run build:sass" "npm run build:postcss"
scripts.prettify: prettier -w *.json *.js css/* js/* content/**/*.html content/**/*.inc theme/templates/*.html
scripts.prettier:check: prettier -c *.json *.js css/* js/* content/**/*.html content/**/*.inc theme/templates/*.html
